ovdesc.p: The Department Printer Table defines the printer id for each department and form type entered. Thus, messages for a particular department can be directed to that department's printer, and separate printers can be allocated for different form types within that department.
Note : Printers can be shared between departments and form types.

desc.p: Identifies the department and form type that this record relates to.
If the INSTALL PARAMETER field in DE.PARM is 'R' (Resident) then the department must be defined on the DEPT.ACCT.OFFICER table (ref: General Tables), otherwise it must be 1-4 numeric characters.
a) Department code b) '.' c) Form type (must be a valid form type on the DE.FORM.TYPE table). (All parts are mandatory)
Specifies the ID of the printer that will print messages for this Department. Must be a valid entry on the PRINTER ID file.

If entered, messages for this Department and form type will be sent to the printer defined on the PRINTER ID file; if blank, messages for this Department and form type will be sent to the system printer.
1-30 type A (alphanumeric) characters. Optional input. The main system printer will be used if this field is not entered.
